email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Could you consider $49.50 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the vessel’s availability and any demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve checked with the owner, and they’re willing to come down to $50.00 per metric ton, but that’s their best offer. The MV Ocean Star is confirmed available for your laycan. Demurrage is set at $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. $50.00 per metric ton is acceptable, provided we can finalize the demurrage at $18,000 per day. Also, could you confirm the vessel’s ETA at Houston? Let’s wrap this up soon. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, good news—the owner has agreed to your demurrage rate of $18,000 per day. The MV Ocean Star’s ETA at Houston is 14 October, so it fits perfectly within your laycan. Shall we proceed with the fixture? Let me know, and I’ll draft the charter party. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that sounds great. Let’s proceed with the fixture at $50.00 per metric ton and $18,000 per day demurrage. Please send over the charter party for review. Thanks for your help on this. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent! I’ll prepare the charter party and send it over by end of day. Thanks for your trust and cooperation. Looking forward to more business together. Best, Sarah
